channel.title: ARC, AI on l0.ai
channel.description: Recent content in ARC, AI on l0.ai

item.title: The ARC Challenge
item.description: Build a model $f_{\theta}(X, p) = Y$ that will take as input a support sample of input images $x_i \in X$ and a program $p$ and output _resulting_ images $y_i \in Y$, where $x_i$ and $y_i$ are samples of input/output pairs where the output can be _generated_ by applying $p$ to the input $x_i$ in the pair. For each training episode $i \in N$ , for a small $N$ is an example of the result of executing a program, such that our model learns to execute arbitrary programs.
